comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: NY State Senator George Washington Plunkitt (1842-1924), part of the Tammany Hall crowd; noted for his quote, "I seen my opportunities and I took 'em." en.wikipedia.org/wiki/George_Washington_Plunkitt

comment.author: 33472394@N00
comment._content: Plunkett's book Plunkett of Tammany Hall is a very revealing look at the political world of the late 19th century. I highly recommend it for anyone interested in the history of the period. There are some free etexts of the book online, including at Project Gutenberg.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: LOC -- You (and Bain) have misspelled his last name -- should read "Plunkitt."

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: Thank you pennylrichardsca, Dendroica cerulea and Wystan for your comments. We will add more information about Plunkitt to the description and correct the spelling of his name.
